mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rocky_member rm INNER JOIN t_bbs_user_group tbug ON rm.ID = tbug.USER_ID INNER JOIN t_bbs_usergroup tbu ON tbug.GROUP_ID =tbu.ID WHERE tbu.STATUS = 0 AND tbu.ID = 1 AND rm.ID = #{userId}

select i.ID, i.TITLE, i.CLICKNUM, i.CREATETIME, i.COLUMNID, i.STATUS, i.ISSCREEN, i.ISDELETE, (select count(*) from rocky_bbs_notes n where n.ITEMID = i.ID) noteCount, (select a.NAME from rocky_bbs_columns a where a.ID = i.COLUMNID) as columnName, (select m.USERNAME from rocky_member m where m.ID = i.OWNER) userName, (select USERIDMD5 from rocky_member where id=i.OWNER limit 1 ) as userIdMD5 from rocky_bbs_items i
where i.OWNER = #{userId}
and i.STATUS = 0
and i.STATUS = 0 and i.ISDELETE = 0
order by i.CREATETIME desc

select count(*) from rocky_bbs_items i
where i.OWNER = #{userId}
and i.STATUS = 0
and i.STATUS = 0 and i.ISDELETE = 0
order by i.CREATETIME desc
